general.gigTitle: design, redesign, build, copy clone or revamp wordpress website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Professional WordPress Developer and CMS Expert
sellerCard.description:
Hi Fiverr Community, Iâ€™m Shohan a Certified WordPress Developer With 5+ Experience. I've built a Wide Range of Websites in Different Kinds of Niches, Like E-commerce, Real Estate, Blogs, Listing Businesses, etc.

Also, Client Satisfaction is My Main Goal. I have successfully crafted visually stunning and highly functional WordPress websites for a diverse range of clients across various industries.

Also, Have a Skilled and Experienced Team for Doing All Kinds of Websites. So I Always Prioritize All My Client's Requirements and Give 

Let Me Know if You Have Any Questions About Your Projects.

description.content:
Are you looking for a professional WordPress developer to design, redesign, build, rebuild, duplicate, copy, clone, or revamp WordPress websites?


If so, You have come to the right place!


With over 5 years of hands-on experience in WordPress Development, I specialize in designing and developing custom web pages tailored to your specific needs. I will craft a fully functional website incorporating your preferred colors, fonts.


Whether you're looking for a corporate site, an e-commerce platform, any other type of WordPress-based site, I have the expertise to bring your vision to life.


I can create any kind of Website with:


Personal Blog

Portfolio Website

Real Estate/Realtors

News, Magzine, Brand, Product

E-commerce (WooCommerce)

School/College/University

Wedding, Travel, Art Gallery

Hotel Booking and Appointment

Author, Writers

Athlete, Sports, Health & Fitness

Elearning, LMS site

Customization, Cloning & Migration


Why I'm Best:


100% Satisfaction

24/7 Communication and Support

Unlimited Revision

Up to 30 Days of Free Support


So, why are you waiting for? Don't miss out on the opportunity to experience exceptional service. Let's have a quick chat and discuss your project

slide.name: design, redesign, build, copy clone or revamp wordpress website development

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why is it compulsory to contact first before ordering?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Because we can discuss the availability, cost, and delivery time of a project and other feasibilities. Every job is different and needs a specific amount of time, dedication, and commitment, so kindly contact me before ordering.

questionsAndAnswers.question: If I provide references to a website. Would you be able to clone the same design for me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Firstly, I'll check your reference website and let you know the details about your reference website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you add or copy products from websites like AliExpress/Amazon/eBay, or Etsy to my online store?
Will I able to edit or modify my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! You can easily modify your website. If you are not a technical person, I'll send you a short video tutorial so you can edit your website without any Coding Knowledge.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is those packages the final price for your gig?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, the price will depend on your website requirements. If you want to know the perfect price for your website, please send a message with your website requirements. I'll send a price quotation based on your website and needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you provide support after completing the order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of course, I'll provide you with 30 days of free ongoing support. Also, You can contact me at any time if you need my help.

packageList.title: Basic ( 1 page / Landing Page)
packageList.description: I will design or redesign landing page Website.

packageList.title: Standard (Up to 3-6 pages Website)
packageList.description: I will design or redesign 6 pages website with an-eye-catching view.

packageList.title: Premium (Up to 6-10 pages Website)
packageList.description: I will Design or redesign 10 page Website with big Business Store

reviews.comment: I have to say that in all honesty, I have never worked with a more competent and honest resource. Shohan, is an extremely capable resource with the utmost level of integrity that has become so rare in our society today. Working with him was reminiscent of older days when you could work in an environment of trust and security. In conclusion I highly recommend this resource.

seller_response.comment: Outstanding Experience! Thank you so much for choosing me as your service provider.

reviews.comment:
"I recently worked with Shohan to create a website for my fitness training center, and Iâ€™m thrilled with the results! The site is modern, energetic, and matches my vision perfectly. 

Shohan was skilled, efficient, and accommodating to my budget and timeline, even providing help with photos and animations. The project was delivered on time with excellent communication throughout.

If you need a high-quality website, I highly recommend Shohan! Thank you for bringing my vision to life!"

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your review, customer satisfaction is truly important to me and I am glad you noticed it.

reviews.comment: I had an amazing experience! He designed fully responsive website for my agency, exactly as I envisioned. Communication was excellent, and the delivery was super fast. Highly recommend him for anyone looking for a professional WordPress website!

seller_response.comment: I really appreciate your kind words! It was great working with you. Looking forward to future projects! ðŸ˜Š

reviews.comment: Very responsive and professionally active! Good communication, good skills, and the quality expected were delivered. I love my new website and the mobile version is perfect. Will work with Shohan again in the future.

seller_response.comment: Thank you! I truly appreciate your kind words and trust in my work. It was a pleasure bringing your vision to life, and Iâ€™m delighted that you love your website. Canâ€™t wait to collaborate again on future projects!

reviews.comment: I had a fantastic experience working with this seller on my website redesign! They truly understood my vision and transformed my wedding planning website into something elegant, modern, and professional. I highly recommend their services to anyone in need of a top-notch WordPress website!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your feedback; it means a lot to me. I enjoyed bringing your vision to life and creating a professional wedding planning website. I look forward to future collaborations. Wishing you much success!
